article: Another secret of animals' survival is telepathy . This sense becomes atrophied in man, but a(n) _ thought-communication functions in animals. Elsa stayed behind with George in Isiolo 180 miles away . He did not know when I was coming back, no person knew. But Elsa knew. On the morning of my _ she sat down at the entrance and wouldn't make any _ until I arrived in the evening. I have known this kind of thought-communication with the animal with whom I've lived. When Elsa died, I woke in the night, knowing what had happened, even though I was several miles away. The same thing occurred later with one of Pippa's cubs. I don't _ this sensitivity with my own kind. Feel far more in tune with what is going on when I am in the bush than when I am in London on Nairobi.
